p: The fumigation and contact activity of trans-cinnamaldehyde on V. virens was shown in Table 2. The EC 50 values of trans-cinnamaldehyde against mycelial growth and conidial germination were both less than 0.5 µL/L air in the fumigation activity assay, and 2.13 µg/mL and 35.9 µg/mL in the contact activity assay, respectively.
